trans-unit.source: Single Sign-On

seg-source.mrk: Single Sign-On

target.mrk: Single-Sign-On

trans-unit.source: Single Sign-On using Windows and Kerberos/SPNEGO

seg-source.mrk: Single Sign-On using Windows and Kerberos/SPNEGO

target.mrk: Single Sign-On mit Windows und Kerberos/SPNEGO

trans-unit.source: Use this configuration to enable Single Sign-On (SSO) in a Windows environment that supports user authentication using Kerberos and SPNEGO .

seg-source.mrk: Use this configuration to enable Single Sign-On (SSO) in a Windows environment that supports user authentication using Kerberos and SPNEGO .

target.mrk: Benutzen Sie diese Konfiguration um Single Sign-On (SSO) in einer Windows-Umgebung zu aktivieren, die eine Authentifizierung über Kerberos und SPNEGO unterstützt.

trans-unit.source: Before you start, check that you have the following pre-requisites.

seg-source.mrk: Before you start, check that you have the following pre-requisites.

target.mrk: Bevor Sie beginnen, stellen Sie sicher, dass folgende Vorbedingungen erfüllt sind.

trans-unit.source: Windows domain users added to Workflow Accelerator, e.g. using LDAP synchronisation.

seg-source.mrk: Windows domain users added to Workflow Accelerator, e.g. using LDAP synchronisation.

target.mrk: Windows Domänennutzer wurden zu Workflow Accelerator hinzugefügt, z.B. mit der LDAP Synchronisation

trans-unit.source: A Windows domain for authenticating users.

seg-source.mrk: A Windows domain for authenticating users.

target.mrk: Ein Windows Domänenkonto um die Nutzer zu authentifizieren.

trans-unit.source: A domain account for running Workflow Accelerator - its username and password.

seg-source.mrk: A domain account for running Workflow Accelerator - its username and password.

target.mrk: Ein Domänenkonto um Workflow Accelerator auszuführen - Nutzername und Passwort

trans-unit.source: Workflow Accelerator is installed on a Windows Server that is on the domain.

seg-source.mrk: Workflow Accelerator is installed on a Windows Server that is on the domain.

target.mrk: Workflow Accelerator ist auf einem Windows Server installiert, der sich in der Domäne befindet.

trans-unit.source: Configuring SSO in Apache Tomcat consists of the following steps.

seg-source.mrk: Configuring SSO in Apache Tomcat consists of the following steps.

target.mrk: Die Konfiguration von SSO im Apache Tomcat umfasst folgende Schritte.

trans-unit.source: Install the SPNEGO library’s JAR file.

seg-source.mrk: Install the SPNEGO library’s JAR file.

target.mrk: Installieren Sie die JAR-Datei der SPNEGO Bibliothek.

trans-unit.source: Configure the SPNEGO SSO Servlet filter.

seg-source.mrk: Configure the SPNEGO SSO Servlet filter.

target.mrk: Konfigurieren Sie den SPNEGO SSO Servlet Filter.

trans-unit.source: Add the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">krb5.conf</kbd>and <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">login.conf</kbd> configuration files to <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_HOME/</kbd>.

seg-source.mrk: Add the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">krb5.conf</kbd>and <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">login.conf</kbd> configuration files to <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_HOME/</kbd>.

target.mrk: Fügen Sie <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">krb5.conf</kbd> und <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">login.conf</kbd> Konfigurationsdateien zu <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_HOME/</kbd> hinzu.

trans-unit.source: Register Tomcat’s Service Principal Name (SPN)

seg-source.mrk: Register Tomcat’s Service Principal Name (SPN)

target.mrk: Registrieren Sie Tomcat's Service Principal Name (SPN)

trans-unit.source: Configure Tomcat to be executed with a domain account.

seg-source.mrk: Configure Tomcat to be executed with a domain account.

target.mrk: Stellen Sie ein, dass Tomcat mit einem Domänenkonto ausgeführt wird.

trans-unit.source: Restart Tomcat.

seg-source.mrk: Restart Tomcat.

target.mrk: Starten Sie Tomcat neu.

trans-unit.source: Install the SPNEGO library

seg-source.mrk: Install the SPNEGO library

target.mrk: SPNEGO Bibliothek installieren

trans-unit.source: The SPNEGO library makes it possible to authenticate users by connecting to an Active Directory server.

seg-source.mrk: The SPNEGO library makes it possible to authenticate users by connecting to an Active Directory server.

target.mrk: Die SPNEGO Bibliothek ermöglicht die Authentifizierung von Nutzern durch ein Verbindung zu einem Active Directory Server.

trans-unit.source: To install, copy two files to <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_HOME/lib/</kbd>:

seg-source.mrk: To install, copy two files to <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_HOME/lib/</kbd>:

target.mrk: Für die Installation kopieren Sie die zwei Dateien in das Verzeichnis <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_HOME/lib/</kbd>

trans-unit.source: Configuring the SPNEGO SSO Servlet filter

seg-source.mrk: Configuring the SPNEGO SSO Servlet filter

target.mrk: SPNEGO SSO Servlet Filter konfigurieren

trans-unit.source: The SSO Servlet filter uses Windows authentication to automatically log in when a user accesses Workflow Accelerator.

seg-source.mrk: The SSO Servlet filter uses Windows authentication to automatically log in when a user accesses Workflow Accelerator.

target.mrk: Der SSO Servlet Filter nutzt die Windows-Authentifizierung um Nutzer automatisch einzuloggen sobald sie auf Workflow Accelerator zugreifen.

trans-unit.source: To configure, edit <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_HOME/conf/web.xml</kbd> and add the following lines immediately before the final line (<kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"></web-app></kbd>), from <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$WORKFLOW_HOME/optional/spnego/filter-configuration.xml</kbd>.

seg-source.mrk: To configure, edit <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_HOME/conf/web.xml</kbd> and add the following lines immediately before the final line (<kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"></web-app></kbd>), from <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$WORKFLOW_HOME/optional/spnego/filter-configuration.xml</kbd>.

target.mrk: Für die Konfiguration passen Sie die <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_HOME/conf/web.xml</kbd> an. Kopieren Sie den Inhalt von <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$WORKFLOW_HOME/optional/spnego/filter-configuration.xml</kbd> und fügen Sie Ihn direkt vor der letzten Zeile (<kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"></web-app></kbd>) hinzu.

trans-unit.source: Near the bottom, replace two occurrences of <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">???</kbd> with the domain account’s username and password, respectively.

seg-source.mrk: Near the bottom, replace two occurrences of <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">???</kbd>
with the domain account’s username and password, respectively.

alt-trans.seg-source: Near the bottom, replace two occurrences of <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">???</kbd> with the domain account’s username and password, respectively.
alt-trans.target: Ersetzen Sie die zwei Vorkommnisse von <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">???</kbd> nahe des Endes mit dem entsprechenden Nutzernamen und Passwort des Domänenkontos.

trans-unit.source: Adding SPNEGO configuration files

seg-source.mrk: Adding SPNEGO configuration files

target.mrk: SPNEGO Konfigurationsdateien hinzufügen

trans-unit.source: Copy <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">krb5.conf</kbd> to <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_HOME/</kbd>, and edit the file:

seg-source.mrk: Copy <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">krb5.conf</kbd> to <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_HOME/</kbd>, and edit the file:

target.mrk: Kopieren Sie <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">krb5.conf</kbd> in das Verzeichnis <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_HOME/</kbd> und passen Sie die Datei an:

trans-unit.source: replace five occurrences of <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">ADTEST</kbd> with the Windows domain name

seg-source.mrk: replace five occurrences of <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">ADTEST</kbd> with the Windows domain name

target.mrk: Ersetzen Sie alle Vorkommnisse von <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">ADTEST</kbd> mit dem Namen Ihrer Windows-Domäne.

trans-unit.source: replace <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">123.45.6.7</kbd> with the host name or IP address of the Active Directory server.

seg-source.mrk: replace <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">123.45.6.7</kbd> with the host name or IP address of the Active Directory server.

target.mrk: Ersetzen Sie <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">123.45.6.7</kbd> mit dem Hostnamen oder der IP-Adresse des Active Directory Servers.

trans-unit.source: Copy <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">login.conf</kbd> to <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_HOME/</kbd>.

seg-source.mrk: Copy <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">login.conf</kbd> to <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_HOME/</kbd>.

target.mrk: Kopieren Sie <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">login.conf</kbd> in das Verzeichnis <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_HOME/</kbd>.

trans-unit.source: Registering Tomcat’s Service Principal Name (SPN)

seg-source.mrk: Registering Tomcat’s Service Principal Name (SPN)

target.mrk: Tomcat's Service Principal Name (SPN) registrieren

trans-unit.source: The SPN is the identifier used by Kerberos authentication to associate a service instance with a service logon account. You will have to associate the domain account for Workflow Accelerator with the service’s fully-qualified domain name (FQDN). Therefore, you should register a SPN for every possible alias of the service, including the computer name of the server with and without domain name, as well as any other DNS entries that point to this server. In order to define a SPN, use setspn.exe - part of the Windows Support Tools.

seg-source.mrk: The SPN is the identifier used by Kerberos authentication to associate a service instance with a service logon account.
You will have to associate the domain account for Workflow Accelerator with the service’s fully-qualified domain name (FQDN).

Therefore, you should register a SPN for every possible alias of the service, including the computer name of the server with and without domain name, as well as any other DNS entries that point to this server.
In order to define a SPN, use setspn.exe - part of the Windows Support Tools.

target.mrk: Der SPN ist der Bezeichner, der von der Kerberos-Authentifizierung genutzt wird, um eine Service-Instanz mit einem Service-Domänenkonto zu verknüpfen.
Hierfür müssen Sie das Domänenkonto von Workflow Accelerator mit dem Fully-Qualified Domain Name (FQDN) des Service verbinden.
Sie sollten einen SPN für jeden möglichen Alias des Service anlegen. Dies umfasst den Namen des Servers mit und ohne Domänennamen, sowie alle DNS-Einträge, die auf den Server verweisen.
Um einen SPN anzulegen, verwenden Sie setspn.exe - Teil der Windows Support Tools.

trans-unit.source: For example, our domain is called <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">ADTEST.LOCAL</kbd>, the computer name of the server is <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">VM-42</kbd>, Workflow Accelerator will be available under the domain <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"></br><kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">http://workflow.intranet:8080</kbd> and the domain user account is <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">tomcat@adtest.local</kbd>. Then we would have to register the following SPNs:

seg-source.mrk: For example, our domain is called <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">ADTEST.LOCAL</kbd>, the computer name of the server is <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">VM-42</kbd>, Workflow Accelerator will be available under the domain <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"></br><kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">http://workflow.intranet:8080</kbd> and the domain user account is <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">tomcat@adtest.local</kbd>.
Then we would have to register the following SPNs:

target.mrk: In unserem Beispiel heißt die Domäne <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">ADTEST.LOCAL</kbd>, der Computername des Servers lautet <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">VM-42</kbd>, Workflow Accelerator ist unter der Adresse <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"></br><kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">http://workflow.intranet:8080</kbd> verfügbar und das Domänenkonto heißt <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">tomcat@adtest.local</kbd>.
Daraus ergeben sich die folgenden SPNs:

trans-unit.source: For more information see the Microsoft documentation.

seg-source.mrk: For more information see the Microsoft documentation.

target.mrk: Weitere Information finden Sie in der Microsoft Dokumentation.

trans-unit.source: You can list all registered SPNs which are associated to a domain account with the following command:

seg-source.mrk: You can list all registered SPNs which are associated to a domain account with the following command:

target.mrk: Mit dem folgenden Befehl können Sie alle registrierten SPNs, die mit einem Domänenkonto verknüpft sind, auflisten:

trans-unit.source: Configuring the Tomcat user

seg-source.mrk: Configuring the Tomcat user

target.mrk: Tomcat-Nutzer konfigurieren

trans-unit.source:
By default the Tomcat application server is executed with a local system account. The SSO setup requires the Tomcat to be executed with a domain account. You should use the same domain account which you already configured in
<MadCap:xref href="#ConfiguringSPNEGO" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Configuring the SPNEGO SSO Servlet filter</MadCap:xref>.

seg-source.mrk: By default the Tomcat application server is executed with a local system account.
The SSO setup requires the Tomcat to be executed with a domain account.

You should use the same domain account which you already configured in <MadCap:xref href="#ConfiguringSPNEGO" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Configuring the SPNEGO SSO Servlet filter</MadCap:xref>.

target.mrk: Standardmäßig wird der Tomcat Server mit einem lokalen Systemkonto ausgeführt.
Für das SSO-Setup ist es jedoch erforderlich Tomcat mit einem Domänenkonto auszuführen.

Sie sollten das gleiche Domänenkonto verwenden, dass Sie bereits in <MadCap:xref href="#ConfiguringSPNEGO" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Configuring the SPNEGO SSO Servlet filter</MadCap:xref> konfiguriert haben.

trans-unit.source: Open the Windows services dialogue <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">services.msc</kbd>

seg-source.mrk: Open the Windows services dialogue <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">services.msc</kbd>

target.mrk: Öffnen Sie den Dialog für Windows-Dienste <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">services.msc</kbd>.

trans-unit.source: Select your Apache Tomcat service and open the properties

seg-source.mrk: Select your Apache Tomcat service and open the properties

target.mrk: Wählen Sie den Apache Tomcat Service aus und öffnen Sie die Eigenschaften.

trans-unit.source: Select the Log On tab

seg-source.mrk: Select the Log On tab

target.mrk: Wählen Sie den Tab Anmelden aus.

trans-unit.source: Choose the option This account and fill in the domain account credentials

seg-source.mrk: Choose the option This account and fill in the domain account credentials

target.mrk: Wählen Sie die Option Dieses Konto und tragen Sie die Zugangsdaten des Domänenkontos ein.

trans-unit.source: Troubleshooting

seg-source.mrk: Troubleshooting

target.mrk: Troubleshooting

trans-unit.source: First follow the steps in the SPNEGO Pre-flight checklist. Run the HelloKDC connection test in the $TOMCAT_HOME/ directory to use the krb5.conf and login.conf you configured above.

seg-source.mrk: First follow the steps in the SPNEGO Pre-flight checklist.

Run the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">HelloKDC</kbd> connection test in the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_HOME/</kbd> directory to use the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">krb5.conf</kbd> and <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">login.conf</kbd> you configured above.

target.mrk: Folgen Sie zuerst den Anweisungen in der SPNEGO Pre-flight Checkliste.

Führen Sie den <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">HelloKDC</kbd> Verbindungstest im Verzeichnis <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_HOME/</kbd> aus und benutzen Sie dafür die Dateien <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">krb5.conf</kbd> und <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">login.conf</kbd>, die Sie zuvor konfiguriert haben.

trans-unit.source: Note that in the Pre-flight checklist, the Do we know the address of the KDC? section recommends using the KDC host name instead of the IP address.

seg-source.mrk: Note that in the Pre-flight checklist, the Do we know the address of the KDC?
section recommends using the KDC host name instead of the IP address.

alt-trans.seg-source: Note that in the Pre-flight checklist, the Do we know the address of the KDC? section recommends using the KDC host name instead of the IP address.
alt-trans.target: Beachten Sie, dass in der Pre-flight Checkliste hier Do we know the address of the KDC? empfohlen wird, den Hostnamen des KDC statt der IP-Adresse zu verwenden.

trans-unit.source: If you have completed the setup described here and the SSO is still not working, please make sure you are accessing the web application from a different machine than the one that runs the Tomcat server. Furthermore, check if Integrated Windows Authentication is activated and the Workflow Accelerator system is a trusted service, for instance by adding the address to the local intranet.

seg-source.mrk: If you have completed the setup described here and the SSO is still not working, please make sure you are accessing the web application from a different machine than the one that runs the Tomcat server.
Furthermore, check if Integrated Windows Authentication is activated and the Workflow Accelerator system is a trusted service, for instance by adding the address to the local intranet.

target.mrk: Wenn Sie das hier beschriebene Setup vollständig durchlaufen haben und SSO trotzdem noch nicht funktioniert, stellen Sie sicher, dass Sie von einem gesonderten Rechner auf die Webanwendung zugreifen und nicht direkt von dem Rechner, der den Tomcat Server ausführt.

Stellen Sie weiterhin sicher, dass die Integrierte Windows-Authentifizierung aktiviert ist und Workflow Accelerator zu den vertrauenswürdigen Diensten gehört, z.B. in dem Sie die Adresse zum lokalen Intranet hinzufügen.

trans-unit.source: If you see an error page with the following error message:

seg-source.mrk: If you see an error page with the following error message:

target.mrk: Wenn Sie eine Fehlerseite mit dem folgenden Fehler sehen:

trans-unit.source: The time difference between the computer accessing Workflow Accelerator and the Kerberos server is bigger than 5 minutes. You will need to synchronise the time on all machines, e.g. by running ntp to fix the issue.

seg-source.mrk: The time difference between the computer accessing Workflow Accelerator and the Kerberos server is bigger than 5 minutes.
You will need to synchronise the time on all machines, e.g. by running ntp to fix the issue.

target.mrk: Der Zeitunterschied zwischen dem Computer, der auf Workflow Accelerator zugreift und dem Kerberos Server ist größer als fünf Minuten.
Sie müssen die Zeit zwischen allen Maschinen synchronisieren, z.B. in dem Sie ntp ausführen.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, you can check the log files in <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_HOME/logs</kbd> for further error messages. These error messages may offer hints about why the SSO set-up is failing.

seg-source.mrk: Additionally, you can check the log files in <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_HOME/logs</kbd> for further error messages.
These error messages may offer hints about why the SSO set-up is failing.

target.mrk: Zusätzlich können Sie auch die Log-Dateien im Verzeichnis <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_HOME/logs</kbd> auf Fehlernachrichten überprüfen.
Diese Fehlermeldungen können weitere Hinweise enthalten, warum Ihr SSO-Setup nicht funktioniert.

trans-unit.source: If the log files contain the error message <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">Request header is too large</kbd>, the size of the Kerberos tickets issued by your KDC and sent in the request header are too large for the default Tomcat settings. You have to set the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">maxHttpHeaderSize</kbd> option in the Tomcat <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">server.xml</kbd>.

seg-source.mrk: If the log files contain the error message <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">Request header is too large</kbd>, the size of the Kerberos tickets issued by your KDC and sent in the request header are too large for the default Tomcat settings.
You have to set the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">maxHttpHeaderSize</kbd> option in the Tomcat <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">server.xml</kbd>.

target.mrk: Wenn die Log-Dateien die Fehlernachricht <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">Request header is too large</kbd> enthalten, dann sind die Kerberos-Tickets, die von Ihrem KDC ausgegeben und im Anfrage-Header versendet werden, zu groß für die Tomcat-Standardeinstellungen.
Sie müssen zusätzlich die Option <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">maxHttpHeaderSize</kbd> in der Tomcat <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">server.xml</kbd> setzen.

trans-unit.source: Open <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_HOME/conf/server.xml</kbd>

seg-source.mrk: Open <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_HOME/conf/server.xml</kbd>

target.mrk: Öffnen Sie <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_HOME/conf/server.xml</kbd>

trans-unit.source: Locate the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">Connector</kbd> configuration in the file

seg-source.mrk: Locate the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">Connector</kbd> configuration in the file

target.mrk: Finden Sie den Konfigurationseintrag <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">Connector</kbd> in der Datei

trans-unit.source: Add the value <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">maxHttpHeaderSize="65536"</kbd>:

seg-source.mrk: Add the value <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">maxHttpHeaderSize="65536"</kbd>:

target.mrk: Fügen Sie den Wert <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">maxHttpHeaderSize="65536"</kbd> hinzu

trans-unit.source: Save the file and restart Tomcat

seg-source.mrk: Save the file and restart Tomcat

target.mrk: Speichern Sie die Datei und starten Sie Tomcat neu
